input.sentences: city hall sits off by itself on a small corner road .
it is made of stone and very well built .
city hall has a green side door .
behind city hall is a row of houses with barns . this one is particularly run down .
the houses sit side by side with nice vehicles parked in front .
output.sentences: City hall sits on a major road.
The hall was built of stone.
The door of the hall is green.
All of the houses by the hall run in a row.
Vehicles sit parked along the road.
